Exclusive semi-new chalet in Becerril Engel&Völkers presents this exclusive villa of recent construction with all the advantages of new energies. From the garden we access to a large and open terrace that gives access to the house. Modern design with large windows that give a lot of light to the whole property. We pass to a cosy living room with fireplace with caset that has an integrated kitchen, which makes it a very pleasant place for family and friends meetings. There is also a guest toilet. On this same floor we have the very spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. From which you can access the garden at the back. We go up to the upper floor where there are two large bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms each one of them and an area that could be used as an office that communicates with the main floor. It has been built with good qualities, it has aerotermia, underfloor heating. PVC windows with double glazing and tilt and turn windows. From the main floor we go to the basement which is semi-basement. Given the recent construction, the garden is untouched, so the new owners could design it as they wish. Close to the town centre and public transport. Becerril de la Sierra is located in a unique enclave within the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park: 45 km from the capital with two main roads, one via the M601 which gives access to the AP-6 and the other via the M-607 which connects with the Colmenar road and Plaza Castilla. Close to the ski resort of Puerto de Navacerrada, Valle de La Barranca, Santillana and Navacerrada reservoirs, with spectacular spots for all kinds of nature activities. It has a wide range of restaurants, cultural and sporting activities, a variety of schools, public, private, subsidised and bilingual. It also has a wide range of shopping centres. Less than 10 minutes away by car is the General Hospital of Collado Villalba.

·Chance! We do not charge commission to the buyer. Housing located in the mountains of Madrid with beautiful views. A quiet place full of charm. The house is very bright, which makes it even more beautiful. The house has two floors, which are distributed as follows: UPPER FLOOR: Armored door, hall, bathroom with washing machine and dryer, American kitchen and living room + terrace that serves as a dining room, all glazed and acclimatized. (Low-cost electric heating). LOWER FLOOR: Studio bedroom of about 25m2, full bathroom with built-in shower and sink, separate toilet and 8m2 dressing room. There's no comunity charges.

Great house in Becerril de la Sierra Engel & Völkers presents this great house in the Sierra Noroeste of Madrid, with beautiful views of La Maliciosa and spacious and bright spaces comfortably distributed. On the first floor are the dinning room and living room with a fireplace and access to the porch and a beautiful garden with swimming pool. Next door there is a comfortable room with sauna, dressing room, bathroom and kitchen, ideal to enjoy with friends and family. On this floor there is also a kitchen, 5 bedrooms and two bathrooms. Going up through the elevator or by the stairs, we find on the first floor a bright living room due to the natural light provided by a window that opens onto a terrace. There is a main room, spacious and cozy that has a full bathroom. Going up other stairs, we have a comfortable room with dressing room and a bathroom. To guarantee the greatest comfort, the house has air conditioning, solar panels to heat the water in the pool and a generator. The property is located in an urbanization in the municipality of Becerril de la Sierra located northwest of Madrid, 45 km from the capital, in a unique enclave within the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. It has two main access roads, one through the M-601 that gives access to the AP-6 and another through the M-607 that connects with the Colmenar and Plaza Castilla highway. It is an urban area, one of the most sought after by nature lovers due to its proximity to the Puerto de Navacerrada ski resort, the La Barranca Valley and the Santillana and Navacerrada reservoirs. It also has a wide range of restaurants, cultural and sports activities. Starting from this location, various routes and trips are usually prepared, both on foot and by car. There is a diversity of public, private and concerted schools. It also has a wide range of shopping centers, and the Collado Villalba General Hospital is less than 10 minutes away by car. In addition to all this, it has a privileged location in Becerril De La Sierra, it is in a very quiet place, with little traffic.

CAPITAL HOME ALPEDRETE sells a magnificent independent villa fully renovated very close to the ambulatory and the town center of the municipality. This is an independent villa built in 1972, updated throughout its useful life to this day, with a constructed area of 238m2, built on a 646m2 plot. It is distributed as follows; In the first place, we locate the entrance hall, where we are previously preceded by a large terrace facing south-east, with magnificent views, ideal for having breakfast, eating with the family or having a rest space.Next, we have the complete kitchen, this enlarged one, in the shape of a large tube, has several windows and a comfortable pantry for day to day. Next, we find the living-dining room, with a diamond shape, where the rest space and the dining area are located well differentiated, with direct access to a large terrace, with the possibility of adding it to the previous room, it is a very special space Due to its south-west orientation, it is ideal for family celebrations, with views of the garden, perfectly maintained and with a very attractive consolidated area of vegetation. Next, we go to the first 1st floor, where we find two double bedrooms, both with built-in wardrobes, and two complete bathrooms, in both cases with a window and a shower tray. On the second 2nd floor, we find two triple bedrooms, both with built-in wardrobes, supplied by a complete bathroom with a hydromassage bathtub, one of the rooms has a fireplace in the room itself. On the top 3rd floor, there is a room as an office, game room, multipurpose room. In addition, on the lower floor of the living-dining room, to which we have access from the interior and exterior, we find a very large living room, super cool in summer, hot in winter, where we have a full kitchen, full bathroom with shower and lots of natural light. Regarding the characteristics of the house we can contemplate; Individual heating with a 1000L diesel tank, perfectly preserved burner, possibility of establishing solar panels, exterior carpentry in PVC vinyl-coated wood, interior carpentry in cherry and oak wood, AC5 wooden floors in the rest area, ceramic floors in almost the entire house but with different finishes and colors, fully updated electrical system, has 3 independent boxes. As for other elements, the plot has its own well with all the updated system, on the Tyrolean façade and recently installed stone plaster, perimeter stone fencing with a steel element, the house faces three streets, it has two automatic doors for vehicles, a perfectly adequate barbecue area, a space for pets that is fenced, a lot of green area and multiple plant elements that add a special charm to the house.In addition, it has a storage room under the floor of the house, with full accessibility where the boiler room is also located. The autonomy for day to day is full due to its location, close to the urban area 550m away, we find the Local Office less than 350m away, all the shops such as the Domca Pastry Shop, Pharmacy, Supermarkets, multiple restaurant options, Public Schools, etc. Finally, in terms of transport services, we have lines 690, 691 and 696, as well as easy access to the M-601 highway with direct access to the A-6 and neighboring municipalities, as well as the Colmenar highway. M-607.

CAPITAL HOME ALPEDRETE SELLS A FOUR-FLOOR TOWNHOUSE, IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BECERRIL DE LA SIERRA, IN A MAGNIFICENT LOCATION CLOSE TO THE URBAN CENTER AND THE MOUNTAINS. We are facing a construction rehabilitated in 1994, composed of 172m2 divided into four floors, with north-east and south-west orientation. It consists of a living-dining room, a complete kitchen with a dining room, a toilet, on the upper floor we find two double bedrooms with direct access to a shared terrace, a storage room with a skylight, a full bathroom and on the top floor a complete suite with a huge terrace. In the cellar or basement floor there is a large space that can be completely molded to your liking, currently arranged in several rooms. IT IS DISTRIBUTED AS FOLLOWS; First of all, as soon as we enter the house, we have the hall, which leads to the living-dining room, where the dining area and the rest area can be distinguished, in both cases with a very good spaciousness. Next, we access the kitchen, shaped like a tube and with the possibility of generating a single space with the living room. Arranged in this last space we have a courtesy toilet. Secondly, we move to the rest area, where we find a first room used as a dressing room or storage room, with a fantastic skylight, followed by the complete bathroom with a shower cabin. In addition, two double bedrooms, with a built-in wardrobe and direct access to a shared north-facing terrace. On the top floor, there is a single room of considerable size, with a complete en-suite bathroom, also of excellent spaciousness, and direct access to a large private terrace. HOUSING CHARACTERISTICS; It has PVC exterior carpentry with double glazing, pine wood interior carpentry, porcelain floors, electric heating with aluminum radiators, a wine cellar with many possibilities, south-east and north-west orientation, with fantastic mountain views. and full proximity to it. The autonomy for day-to-day life is full due to its location, close to the town center 550m away, we find the Local Clinic less than 350m away, all the shops such as the Domca Pastry Shop, Pharmacy, Supermarkets, multiple restaurant options, Public Schools, etc. Finally, in terms of transportation services, we have lines 690, 691 and 696, as well as easy access to the M-601 highway with direct access to the A-6 and neighboring municipalities, as well as the Colmenar highway. M-607.

description: Spectacular detached house in the Northwest mountains of the Community of Madrid.The house built on a plot of 1800 m2 has an incomparable charm, it is cozy, bright, comfortable, magical, as soon as you know it you will love it. The facade made of stone, with that character of the Madrid mountains, the house is incredibly bright due to its very large windows, it is equipped with the best qualities, clay and stoneware floors, underfloor heating, pine wood in the shutters, Walnut entrance door with automatic light sensors, Arabic-style white bricks, ceramics on the stairs, exceptional beech carpentry, among others. The house inside is distributed as follows: -Low level: Spacious and cozy game room with fireplace and wine cellar Very nice sauna with outside shower Commissary – Pantry bathroom support Storage space under the stairs Machine room Garage with space for several vehicles, water well, diesel tank. -Street Plan: Large and spacious 110 m2 living room, divided into different rooms with a wonderful fireplace made of white bricks in Arabic style, precious Menex Pine wood shutters, all windows with mosquito nets with direct views of the garden porch. Living room, comfortable place where there are, large window overlooking the garden Comfortable gas kitchen, notable for having an access door with direct access to the back of the garden. Bedroom with en-suite bathroom and built-in wardrobe Auxiliary bathroom in the stair area -First floor: It has 4 bedrooms, a majestic master bedroom with exceptional measurements, very large windows with awnings and automated blinds, a dressing room, a full bathroom with a bathtub and a separate toilet. quarter iron 3 bedrooms with a spectacular terrace, communicated through it, with a wonderful view of the garden areas, all have fitted wardrobes. 2 large bathrooms with a bathtub in the hallway -Second floor: 3 bedrooms on the upper floor, were converted into 2 large ones, both with sloping ceilings. The first of them with a balcony overlooking the pool and the grove, also has a fireplace and different environments, Velux-type windows. The second bedroom on this floor, originally two, is L-shaped, very charming, an area intended at this time for the enjoyment of the smallest of the house, very bright with several Velux-type windows on the roof. It also has a bathroom in the corridor with a bathtub and a room in the same corridor as a storage area. -Outside area: Having so many meters of plot, we appreciate different environments, entrance area with two doors, pedestrian access door and another for vehicles with a garage access ramp. In the area to the right there is an additional small house with an integrated bathroom, living room, fireplace and bedroom, a place designed in its day for the caretaker of the estate. In the central area, a covered wooden porch of approximately 50 m2 for use and enjoyment, a barbecue area, large space for tables and also has a generous auxiliary room for a pantry. Pool area, fenced pool, has a measure of approximately 12x6 meters, has natural grass and a rear area with a sewage treatment plant and a utility room. The area stands out for being at the foot of the Cabrera peak, in the Sierra de Guadarrama, belonging to Becerril de la Sierra, a few meters from the town of Mataelpino and only 8 kilometers from the wonderful town of Navacerrada. We will be delighted to show you this wonderful property!

The heating is a heat pump that is used for both heat and cold. Although given the characteristics of the construction it is usually heated with the wood burning fireplace that has an exit on the main floor and in the master bedroom. >>> ATTENTION, UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY IN URBAN TOWN<<< Let me introduce you to this formidable newly built house. On the solid pillars of the original house, a modern house has been built with all the current comforts: underfloor heating on the two main floors, radiators in the semi-basement floor, imitation wood ceramic floors, natural gas connection already registered in Industry, excavation for a 15x2m pool designed in the shape of a "P", white aluminum tilt-and-turn exterior carpentry on the main floor and PVC on the upper floor, electricity and plumbing fully finished, interior carpentry in oak, semi-basement floor with access to an English patio, well... has it all! Main floor with closed garage for 2 cars and direct access to the interior of the house; large laundry room with space for a washer and dryer and with ventilation and natural light; room for coats, suitcases or whatever you need to have on hand, fully dressed and with an exterior window; Master bedroom with dressing room and bathroom on this floor... just what we are all looking for! Bright living room with access to the terrace and rear garden and connected to the large kitchen, fully equipped with plenty of storage space and lots of light... You're going to love it! A practical guest toilet, also exterior, completes the distribution of this floor. On the upper floor we find 3 comfortable bedrooms, one of them larger than the others designed as an office or guest room, all of them with large fully fitted built-in wardrobes and a complete bathroom. All rooms are exterior. It has a semi-basement floor, with access to an English patio, where we have a tool room, a toilet and a large multipurpose space, with ventilation and natural light, that you can use for whatever you need: gym, games room, movie room.. . The house is yet to be finished, so you will need to make an investment before moving permanently... and you will have the best house in the area! We do not charge fees to the buyer, so contact us immediately and organize your visit. Occasions like this can't be missed!

description: JLC presents three new construction homes in Becerril de la Sierra. The homes will have a total of 119 m² and the plot area is 560 m². Nothing is done, you will be the one who chooses the distribution, where the plugs go, if you want four or three rooms... The plots are located in the Becerril urbanization, close to nature, and the well-known "Fuente del Piojo". You will enjoy SPECTACULAR VIEWS of the mountains and countryside.You will enjoy tranquility on the street, and at the same time, proximity to all services by vehicle. Independent chalets will be built with enough space for a beautiful garden, the price per square meter is €1,400/m². The price includes: - Single-family home of 119 m². - Plot in the Becerril de la Sierra urbanization. - Aerothermal energy (technology that extracts energy contained in the outside air thanks to a system of pumps). - Geotechnical and topographic study. - Project and construction management. - Major urban planning license. - The front fence. - 40 meters of floated concrete. JLC Construcciones is a company with more than 20 years of experience, which has its own Architecture Studio.We will manage all the necessary procedures to carry out the work and comply with all the regulations of the Technical Building Code. In the images of the advertisement, you can see models of constructions carried out by JLC in previous years. Call us, we are waiting for you. Our real estate website so you can take a look at our plots: We also have Facebook: JLC Inmobiliaria Our construction website: www.jlconstruction.is We also have Facebook: JLC Construcciones Ref.675.

Wonderful villa of 415 m2 built on a magnificent plot of 1340 m2, with a great variety of trees such as chestnut, pine, walnut, fir, strawberry tree and fruit trees such as cherry, fig, and quince. Beautiful pool in perfect condition with a nice porch with barbecue, dressing rooms and doghouse. A cozy house with wonderful views from any corner. It has a porch on the main façade and another covered with large windows overlooking the Sierra de Guadarrama, just 45 km from Madrid and with all the necessary services provided by a population such as Becerril de la Sierra. On the main floor, we find a beautiful hall that leads to a very spacious living room, divided into two rooms with a built-in fireplace. A magnificent kitchen surrounded by large windows, a beautiful bedroom and a complete bathroom. On the upper floor there are four bedrooms, the main one measuring 40m2 with an en suite bathroom and mountain views. 3 other large bedrooms and another full bathroom, In the basement area we find a large 40m2 living room that is very cozy and cool in summer, a bathroom, a machine room, a pantry and a garage with direct access to the house.

This property has a private pool and offers stunning views of the mountains, providing a quiet and serene environment all year round. InMountain offers you this magnificent and representative individual villa located in Becerril de la Sierra, in the Sierra del Guadarrama of Madrid. The house has three floors. Spectacular Villa on a 2,000 m2 plot in Becerril de la Sierra. The 720 m2 house is distributed over 3 floors plus basement, Entrance hall, living room of more than 100 m2 in 3 rooms, independent kitchen, eight bedrooms, 2 distributed in the attic, 4 bedrooms on the second floor plus 1 guest suite on the main floor and finally a magnificent ground floor with sauna, cellar, leisure room and garage for 3 vehicles, six bathrooms and 2 toilets, four fireplaces. House independent from the main one with living room with fireplace, bedroom and bathroom. Construction from 1981, very high qualities. Located on a 2,000 m2 plot with a consolidated garden and swimming pool, porch, and independent fully equipped barbecue area. Well connected, close to the M615 and Carretera de Colmenar buses and 724 to the Moncloa Interchange and Plaza Castilla. Becerril de la Sierra is located 50 kilometers from Madrid in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. The town is located at the foot of the Navacerrada Pass, crowned by the Maliciosa peak at 2,227 meters high and surrounded by the Cabeza Mediana and Alto del Hilo mountains, making it one of the most prominent valleys in the Sierra. In this environment of great ecological and cultural value, Becerril de la Sierra was founded and developed, a cozy town with a great livestock tradition as its name indicates.
